posts.post_title: T206s wanted to buy or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David G
I need 39 T206s to complete my set.  Happy to buy or trade.  Looking for graded or raw. Good - VG/Ex cards.  If you are interested in trading I have some dups listed in two other BST post (Atz - Myers) and (Nattress - Wright). Thank you, I appreciate the help!

posts.post_title: T206s wanted to buy or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Christopher
I have some graded T206 cards for sale in PSA 4 VG-EX condition.   I have a section dedicated to T206 cards on my site, and you can see pics of each card by clicking on the card description.    The prices shown are delivered including insurance.   PayPal is accepted at no extra charge.

I did a quick scan of your wantlist and I have the following:

Danny Hoffman
Harry Niles
Heine Wagner

Website is...

[url]http://www.freewebs.com/cassidyssportscards/[/url]
